actions.committee: Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reorts, the other have thirty days of continuous session to report or be discharged
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reorts, the other have thirty days of continuous session to report or be discharged.

actions.committee: Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reorts, the other have thirty days of continuous session to report or be discharged
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reorts, the other have thirty days of continuous session to report or be discharged.

official_title: A bill requiring reductions in outlays for the fiscal years 1986, 1987, and 1988.

summary.text: Requires Federal outlays for FY 1986 through 1988 to be reduced so as to reduce the percentage of the gross national product that the Federal deficit comprises to four percent in FY 1986, three percent in FY 1987, and two percent in FY 1988.

titles.title: A bill requiring reductions in outlays for the fiscal years 1986, 1987, and 1988.
